content: When you emerge on the other side, you'll see the final stretch of the path that dips down and then slopes upward. Head for the top and activate the Peak of Innocence Keeper's Shrine, just before the end of the path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Return Path'.
The content is as follows:
When you emerge on the other side, you'll see the final stretch of the path that dips down and then slopes upward. Head for the top and activate the Peak of Innocence Keeper's Shrine, just before the end of the path.
